org.elasticsearch.action.termvector

Class TermVectorRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder
      • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportMessage<TransportRequest>
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
          • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
            • org.elasticsearch.action.support.single.shard.SingleShardOperationRequest<TermVectorRequest>
              • org.elasticsearch.action.termvector.TermVectorRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndicesRequest, Streamable

    public class TermVectorRequest
extends SingleShardOperationRequest<TermVectorRequest>
    Request returning the term vector (doc frequency, positions, offsets) for a document.

    Note, the SingleShardOperationRequest.index(), type(String) and id(String) are required.

        public TermVectorRequest parent(String parent)
        Sets the parent id of this document. Will simply set the routing to this value, as it is only used for routing with delete requests.

      • preference

        public String preference()

      • preference

        public TermVectorRequest preference(String preference)
        Sets the preference to execute the search. Defaults to randomize across shards. Can be set to _local to prefer local shards, _primary to execute only on primary shards, or a custom value, which guarantees that the same order will be used across different requests.

      • offsets

        public TermVectorRequest offsets(boolean offsets)
        Return the start and stop offsets for each term if they were stored or skip offsets.
